readability_reflection: I found concatenation easier since in most cases it was easy to just place the strings next to each other without having to analyze the whitespace on the line defining the string.
comprehension_debugging: Interpolation was more difficult to debug since it took time to figure out the brackets/parenthesis.
preference_rationale: I would choose concatenation because it seems simpler to write and read.
learning_curve: I have worked with concatenation much more than interpolation. As someone without a ton of coding experience, concatenation is easier to understand for beginners.
suggestions_improvement: Potentially using a symbol for interpolation that is more distinct from parenthesis.
